data.eml:eml: Lithobius (Ezembius) tetraspinus, a new species of centipede from northwest China (Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pei, Sujian, Lu, Yanmin, Liu, Haipeng, Hou, Xiaojie, Ma, Huiqin (2018): Lithobius (Ezembius) tetraspinus, a new species of centipede from northwest China (Lithobiomorpha, Lithobiidae). ZooKeys 741: 203-217, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.741.19980, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.741.19980
